__e: We think 100 years ago, you were living in tents, chopping each other's heads off and that's exactly where you'll be in another 100.
High-fiving each other and slapping each other on the back when they won the case.
"Leave me alone," said the other giant. Then they started to fight.
When I received your book, the emotions inside...
We hear a shot about 20h10 and then we broke the door down.
So they spent a lot of time together doin' a whole lot of nothing, and you get close to people that way, so...
Near Edo, we made our final camp.
Well, we enjoy beating them, too.
Because the last time you talked to me, you told me to open my mouth and you slammed it shut.
He got in your way, so you pounded him till he was dead?
He was struck first. And I, out of fear, did nothing to help him.
But he went too far and you hit him.
He's sick, he's poor, his parents beat upon him, or they didn't.
I think they hit me once, actually, in my whole childhood.
But they didn't understand that and started beating.
You set me up, and he and that woman on his arm knock me down.
